resources.string: Hay una nueva versión disponible.\nLe invitamos a actualizar la aplicación.

This privacy policy governs your use of the software application FlexiFit for Android mobile devices that was created by WMSoftware.
What information we collect?
FlexiFit application does not collect personal information like name, surname, age, date of birth, etc.
We use Google supplied APP performance tracking information to improve Application. This application only makes use of the sound your Android mobile phone to create the alarm.
Google Analytics
This Application uses Google Analytics to help us analyze how you use app. It helps us to improve this product.
Thanks Google Analytics we know how long you use app, what kind of device you're using, where are you from and a little bit more. All this is used to improve the app.
Read more about Google Analytics
Firebase
We use Firebase to store all the app information. Information like personal data and manage the e-mail login to our app.
You can see the entire privacy policy of firebase here.
https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy/?hl=es-419
Advertisement
Google Admob privacy policy is here: https://support.google.com/admob/answer/6128543?hl=en.
Third party vendors, including Google, use cookies to serve ads based on a user's prior visits to your website.
Contact
To contact us please use email: wilfredmoscote@gmail.com

-Acknowledgements
We use these libraries to make FlexiFit:
-shawnlin NumberPicker
-mikhaellopez CircularProgressBar
- Lottie
- Google Fonts
- Google Icons
